text: the FIFA disciplinary committee has
reached a decision in the case related
to Luis Suarez of Goro quite following
an incident that occurred during the
FIFA World Cup match between Italy and
Uruguay played on 24 June 2014 the FIFA
disciplinary committee has decided that
the player Luis Suarez is regarded as
having breached article 41 of 48 sorry
article 48 paragraph 1 of the FIFA
disciplinary record an article 57 of the
FIFA disciplinary record which is an act
of unsporting behavior towards another
player the player Luis Suarez is to be
suspended for nine official matches the
first match of this suspension is to be
served in the upcoming fifa world cup
fixture between Colombia and Uruguay on
28 June 2014 the remaining match
suspension shall be served in law
requires next fifa world cup match
matches as long as the team qualified
and/or in the representative teams
secured subsequent official matches in
accordance with article 38 paragraph to
aid of the FIFA disciplinary code the
player Luis Suarez is banned from taking
part in any kind of football-related
activity administrative sport or any
other for a period of four months in
accordance with article 22 of the FIFA
disciplinary code a stadium banned is
pronounced against the player Luis
Suarez in accordance with article 21 of
the FIFA disciplinary code as follows
the player Luis Suarez is prohibited
from entering the confines of any
stadium during the period of the pattern
the player Luis Suarez is prohibited
from entering the confines of any
stadium in which the representative team
of Iroquois playing while he has to
served the nine match suspension the
player Luis Suarez is ordered to pay a
fine in the amount of 100,000 so as
friends the decision was notified to the
play and Uruguayan FA this morning and
here a quote from the chairman of the
FIFA disciplinary
klaudia salsa such behavior can not be
tolerated on any football pitch and in
particular not at the FIFA World Cup
when the eyes of millions of people are
on the Stars on the field the
disciplinary committee took into account
all the factors of the case and the
decree of mr. Suarez guilt in accordance
with the relevant provisions of the code
the decision comes into force as soon it
is communicated
